thread.title: ‘LOLOL’! Keith Olbermann: There will NOT be a ceasefire in the ‘political civil war’ during the game
thread.title_full: ‘LOLOL’! Keith Olbermann: There will NOT be a ceasefire in the ‘political civil war’ during the game

author: Doug P.
title: ‘LOLOL’! Keith Olbermann: There will NOT be a ceasefire in the ‘political civil war’ during the game
text:
‘LOLOL’!   ‘political civil war’ during the game Posted at 9:30 am on February 4, 2017 by Doug P. 
There’s been a call to “take the politics outside” when the game is on: When sportscasters and celebrities put their political opinions front and center, we lose something valuable. https://t.co/yHRSH8nIIP 
— Ben Domenech (@bdomenech) February 3, 2017 
Keith Olbermann, vocal supporter of The Resistance , took great exception: Look, Goober, your side started a political civil war. The smart people aren't going to shut up and obey, so you can watch effing sports. https://t.co/Kb6Y4Xj9CL 
— Keith Olbermann (@KeithOlbermann) February 4, 2017 
It’s a little funny, right? I think you needed quotes around the part of the tweet everyone laughed at https://t.co/mKN248LdN0 
— Liars Never Win (@liars_never_win) February 4, 2017 Smart people know that people who are actually smart don't have to go around telling everyone that they're the smart people. https://t.co/grssXL61jt
